articles.title: Video of woman confronting Muslims eating during Ramadan goes viral, sparks debate online - AsiaOne
articles.description: A video of a woman confronting a group of tudung-wearing women for eating in broad daylight, including non-halal food – at a hawker centre during the fasting month of Ramadan – has gone viral online this week, with Malaysian viewers commenting as well. Ramada…

articles.title: Who's the daddy? J-pop star Ayumi Hamasaki gives birth to second child - AsiaOne
articles.description: TOKYO - Japanese singer Ayumi Hamasaki is now a mother of two. She announced last weekend that she has given birth to her second child. The queen of J-pop announced on her official website on Saturday night (May 1) that she has "added an important family memb…

articles.title: Amid India’s coronavirus crisis, Asia’s developing nations are all at risk - South China Morning Post
articles.description: From Laos, Vietnam and Thailand in Southeast Asia to Bhutan and Nepal bordering India, countries have been reporting significant surges.

articles.author: CNA
articles.title: Olympics: Swimmer calls for expulsion of junta-led Myanmar from Games - CNA
articles.description: MELBOURNE: A leading Myanmar swimmer has called for an international boycott of his country's Olympic committee, branding it a "puppet" of the southeast Asian nation's military rulers.
